creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: predominantly purple and green coat consisting of vertical stripes; silver geometric embroidery decorates some of vertical purple stripes; coat is open at front with 24 pearloid buttons at chest and collar; sleeves extend straight out at sides; coat's collar is hemmed; some floral fabric has been used as patchwork near front opening at coat's bottom half; coat has dark blue and white inner lining
title: Woman's coat
